description: This file contains functions for generating JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enums, version info, and stub code based on a provided JSON schema. It manages file generation, checks for existing files, and handles code emission through various emitter modules.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing JSON-RPC API definitions, including necessary #include directives and headers from the provided list.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to parse JSON schema, generate data classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementation files based on configuration flags. It manages file timestamps to avoid regeneration when up-to-date.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
